name: Bitcoin Price Index
tagline: Shows current bitcoin price in multiple currencies
body: Bitcoin Price Index uses the Blockchain API to allow the user to view the current price of Bitcoin in multiple currencies at a time. Published in Google Play Store at https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=io.github.aaronfields.bitcoinpricetracker.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
